meanings.definition: Automated programs designed to send unsolicited messages or advertisements over the internet.
meanings.sent1: Spambots can flood your inbox with unwanted emails.
meanings.sent2: I received a lot of spam emails from spambots.
meanings.sent3: The spambots seemed to think I needed help finding a new pet lizard.
meanings.sent4: The spambots were like relentless salespeople knocking on my digital door.
meanings.sent5: The spambots were like annoying little robots constantly buzzing around my online space.

meanings.definition: A type of software used to generate and distribute spam emails.
meanings.sent1: Be cautious of clicking on links in emails sent by spambots.
meanings.sent2: Spambots can quickly fill your email with unwanted messages.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if spambots ever get tired of sending the same emails over and over.
meanings.sent4: The spambots worked tirelessly to flood my inbox with junk.
meanings.sent5: The spambots were like little email factories churning out spam messages non-stop.

meanings.definition: Bots that flood online platforms with unwanted or irrelevant content.
meanings.sent1: Spambots can overwhelm social media with irrelevant posts.
meanings.sent2: The spambots were responsible for the flood of fake news on the platform.
meanings.sent3: The spambots turned my feed into a chaotic mess of random posts.
meanings.sent4: The spambots were like digital graffiti artists tagging every corner of the internet.
meanings.sent5: The spambots were like a swarm of locusts devouring all the meaningful content online.
